headline: Netflix All Cash Warner Bros. Bid Tests Debt Limits And Growth Story
summary: Netflix, ticker NasdaqGS:NFLX, has submitted an updated all cash offer to acquire Warner Bros. Discovery. The proposed deal is attracting scrutiny from US regulators and lawmakers, including planned antitrust hearings in the US Senate. UK authorities have been urged to review the transaction given its potential impact on competition in streaming and broader entertainment. Netflix enters this proposed acquisition with its shares at $83.49 and a mixed recent track record, including a 2.6%...
